mapper.select:
select id, orderid, status, userid, pid, shumu, dianhua, dizhi, beizhu, shijian
from t_dingdan where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into t_dingdan(orderid, status, userid, pid, shumu, dianhua, dizhi, beizhu, shijian) values (#{orderid}, #{status}, #{userid}, #{pid}, #{shumu}, #{dianhua}, #{dizhi}, #{beizhu}, #{shijian})

insert into t_dingdan(orderid, status, userid, pid, shumu, dianhua, dizhi, beizhu, shijian) values
(#{entity.orderid}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.userid}, #{entity.pid}, #{entity.shumu}, #{entity.dianhua}, #{entity.dizhi}, #{entity.beizhu}, #{entity.shijian})

insert into t_dingdan(orderid, status, userid, pid, shumu, dianhua, dizhi, beizhu, shijian) values
(#{entity.orderid}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.userid}, #{entity.pid}, #{entity.shumu}, #{entity.dianhua}, #{entity.dizhi}, #{entity.beizhu}, #{entity.shijian})
on duplicate key update orderid = values(orderid), status = values(status), userid = values(userid), pid = values(pid), shumu = values(shumu), dianhua = values(dianhua), dizhi = values(dizhi), beizhu = values(beizhu), shijian = values(shijian)
mapper.update:
update t_dingdan
orderid = #{orderid},
status = #{status},
userid = #{userid},
pid = #{pid},
shumu = #{shumu},
dianhua = #{dianhua},
dizhi = #{dizhi},
beizhu = #{beizhu},
shijian = #{shijian},
where id = #{id}
